content.1: And the angel that talked with me came again, and waked me, as a man that is wakened out of his sleep,
content.2: And said unto me, What seest thou? And I said, I have looked, and behold a candlestick all
content.3: And two olive trees by it, one upon the right
content.4: So I answered and spake to the angel that talked with me, saying, What
content.5: Then the angel that talked with me answered and said unto me, Knowest thou not what these be? And I said, No, my lord.
content.6: Then he answered and spake unto me, saying, This
content.9: The hands of Zerubbabel have laid the foundation of this house; his hands shall also finish it; and thou shalt know that the
content.10: For who hath despised the day of small things? for they shall rejoice, and shall see the plummet in the hand of Zerubbabel
content.11: Then answered I, and said unto him, What
content.12: And I answered again, and said unto him, What
content.13: And he answered me and said, Knowest thou not what these
